藝不壓身.definition: see 藝多不壓身|艺多不压身[yi4 duo1 bu4 ya1 shen1]

藝伎.definition: geisha (Japanese female entertainer); also written 藝妓|艺妓[yi4 ji4]

藝名.definition: stage name (of an actor or actress)

藝圃.definition: The Garden of Cultivation in Suzhou, Jiangsu

藝多不壓身.definition: it's always good to have more skills (idiom)

藝妓.definition: geisha (Japanese female entertainer); also written 藝伎|艺伎[yi4 ji4]

藝校.definition: abbr. for 藝術學校|艺术学校; art school

藝術品.definition: art piece; work of art; CL:件[jian4]

藝術學院.definition: art institute; art and drama college

藝術片.definition: art film; art house film; CL:部[bu4]

藝術造街.definition: city precinct with a streetscape created by artists
